hints.content:
There are $\greenD{32}$ cups with $\purpleC8$ cups in each row.

![Same image with the cups in a row numbered 1 through 8 and horizontal lines between the rows](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4cf7657147cde03232968914f1ddd655eeb3d2c1)

How can we find out how many rows of cups there are?

We can find how many rows of cups there are by dividing:

$\greenD{\text{total}}\div\purpleC{\text{ size of the rows}}$

So, $\greenD{32}\div\purpleC{8}$

The following expression will tell us how many rows of cups there are:

- $\greenD{32}\div\purpleC8$

question.content:
There are $8$ cups in a row. There are $32$ total cups.

![32 cups with 8 cups per row](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4ce3efe7644c2b5fe3270ede70821dacc3afd9ff) 

**Which expression will tell us how many rows of cups there are?**
